comment_0: It sounds motivational, but at the same time it is almost like a warning for when you finally get to the top. "What goes up has to come down" sort of thing. But really I also see it like "the grass is greener on the other side" as well. You get what you want, and it's still not enough, because it's not what you need. You are trying to reach for something that isn't going to keep your cup filled.
